c1.name: Fortress of Fantasy
c1.descriptionRaw:
The Shield Absorption of the Curtain of Slumber generated by <color=#FFD780FF>Nights of Formal Focus</color> is increased by 20%.
Additionally, when unleashing Nights of Formal Focus, she will generate a shield for any nearby party members who are not being protected by a Curtain of Slumber. This shield will have 35% of the absorption of a Curtain of Slumber, will last for 12s, and will absorb <color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo DMG</color> with 250% effectiveness.
c1.description:
The Shield Absorption of the Curtain of Slumber generated by Nights of Formal Focus is increased by 20%.
Additionally, when unleashing Nights of Formal Focus, she will generate a shield for any nearby party members who are not being protected by a Curtain of Slumber. This shield will have 35% of the absorption of a Curtain of Slumber, will last for 12s, and will absorb Cryo DMG with 250% effectiveness.

c2.name: Light's Remit
c2.descriptionRaw: When Shooting Stars from <color=#FFD780FF>Nights of Formal Focus</color> strike opponents, they will each restore 1 Energy to Layla. Each Shooting Star can restore Energy to her in this manner once.
c2.description: When Shooting Stars from Nights of Formal Focus strike opponents, they will each restore 1 Energy to Layla. Each Shooting Star can restore Energy to her in this manner once.

c3.name: Secrets of the Night
c3.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Nights of Formal Focus</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c3.description:
Increases the Level of Nights of Formal Focus by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Starry Illumination
c4.descriptionRaw:
When <color=#FFD780FF>Nights of Formal Focus</color> starts to fire off Shooting Stars, it will grant all nearby party members the Dawn Star effect, causing their Normal and Charged Attack DMG to increase based on 5% of Layla's Max HP.
Dawn Star can last up to 3s and will be removed 0.05s after dealing Normal or Charged Attack DMG.
c4.description:
When Nights of Formal Focus starts to fire off Shooting Stars, it will grant all nearby party members the Dawn Star effect, causing their Normal and Charged Attack DMG to increase based on 5% of Layla's Max HP.
Dawn Star can last up to 3s and will be removed 0.05s after dealing Normal or Charged Attack DMG.

c5.name: Stream of Consciousness
c5.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Dream of the Star-Stream Shaker</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c5.description:
Increases the Level of Dream of the Star-Stream Shaker by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Radiant Soulfire
c6.descriptionRaw:
Shooting Stars from <color=#FFD780FF>Nights of Formal Focus</color> deal 40% increased DMG, and Starlight Slugs from <color=#FFD780FF>Dream of the Star-Stream Shaker</color> deal 40% increased DMG.
Additionally, the interval between the creation of Night Stars via Nights of Formal Focus is decreased by 20%.
